SELECT MWR.WORK_ORDER_ID , MWR.WO_RESULT_ID , MWR.WORK_ORDER_ID || '_' || MWR.WO_RESULT_ID AS KEY_ID , MWO.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , MI.LOT_MANAGEMENT_YN , MI.PRICE_SYNC_YN , MI.PO_OVER_RECEIPT_RATE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MWR.WORK_CENTER_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_WORK_CENTER_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, MWR.WORK_CENTER_CD) FROM DUAL) AS WORK_CENTER_NM , MWO.WO_STATE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MWO.COMPANY_CD, MWO.DIVISION_CD, 'PP0003', MWO.WO_STATE, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS WO_STATE_NM , TO_CHAR(MWR.WORK_DAY ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESULT_DATE , TO_CHAR(MWR.START_TIME ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RESUT_START_TIME , TO_CHAR(MWR.END_TIME ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RESUT_END_TIME , MWR.SHIFT_CD AS SHIFT_DETAIL_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_SHIFT_DETAIL_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, MWR.SHIFT_CD) FROM DUAL) AS SHIFT_DETAIL_NM , MWO.WO_QTY , MWR.GOOD_QTY , MWR.DEFECT_QTY , MWR.STATE AS RESULT_STATE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, 'PP0009', MWR.STATE, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS RESULT_STATE_NM , TO_CHAR(MWR.CREATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RESULT_CREATE_DATE , MWR.CREATE_BY AS RESULT_CREATE_BY ,(SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, MWR.CREATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS RESULT_CREATE_BY_NM , MWR.UPDATE_BY AS RESULT_CANCEL_BY ,(SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, MWR.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS RESULT_CANCEL_BY_NM , TO_CHAR(MWR.CANCEL_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RESULT_CANCEL_DATE , MWO.DESCRIPTION , MWO.COMPANY_CD , MWO.DIVISION_CD , MWO.OUTSOURCING_YN FROM MOM_WO_RESULT MWR , MOM_WORK_ORDER MWO , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MWR.COMPANY_CD = MWO.COMPANY_CD AND MWR.DIVISION_CD = MWO.DIVISION_CD AND MWR.WORK_ORDER_ID = MWO.WORK_ORDER_ID AND MWO.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MWO.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MWO.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MWR.WORK_DAY BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{resultDateSD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{resultDateED, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999
AND (UPPER(MI.ITEM_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MI.ITEM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (UPPER(MWR.WORK_ORDER_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{workOrderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND MWC.WORK_CENTER_CD = #{workCenterCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND MWR.STATE IN (${woState})
AND MWO.OUTSOURCING_YN = #{outsourcingYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY MWR.WORK_ORDER_ID, MWR.WO_RESULT_ID

SELECT MWR.WO_RESULT_ID , MWR.WO_RESULT_ID AS KEY_ID , TO_CHAR(MWR.WORK_DAY ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESULT_CREATE_DATE , TO_CHAR(MWR.START_TIME ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS START_TIME , TO_CHAR(MWR.END_TIME ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS END_TIME , MWR.WORK_CENTER_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_WORK_CENTER_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, MWR.WORK_CENTER_CD) FROM DUAL) AS WORK_CENTER_NM , MWR.GOOD_QTY , MWR.DEFECT_QTY , DECODE(MWR.STATE, 'C', (MWR.GOOD_QTY * -1), NULL) AS GOOD_CANCEL_QTY , DECODE(MWR.STATE, 'C', (MWR.DEFECT_QTY * -1), NULL) AS DEFECT_CANCEL_QTY , MWR.SHIFT_CD AS SHIFT_DETAIL_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_SHIFT_DETAIL_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, MWR.SHIFT_CD) FROM DUAL) AS SHIFT_DETAIL_NM , MWR.STATE AS RESULT_STATE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, 'PP0009', MWR.STATE, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS RESULT_STATE_NM , MWR.CREATE_BY AS RESULT_CREATE_BY ,(SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, MWR.CREATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS RESULT_CREATE_BY_NM , MWR.UPDATE_BY AS RESULT_CANCEL_BY ,(SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MWR.COMPANY_CD, MWR.DIVISION_CD, MWR.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS RESULT_CANCEL_BY_NM , TO_CHAR(MWR.CANCEL_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESULT_CANCEL_DATE , MWR.DESCRIPTION , MWR.WORK_ORDER_ID , MWR.COMPANY_CD , MWR.DIVISION_CD FROM MOM_WO_RESULT MWR WHERE MWR.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MWR.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MWR.WORK_ORDER_ID = #{workOrderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MWR.WO_RESULT_ID
